title: Serious issue
body:
Hi riot 
i'm having some serious ping issues in game idk why actuaaly coz i'm having all my downlaods at 1 Mb/s so i think my internet is fine although i'm having some high pingg . it's like this i get 79ms in the beginning it last for 5min then just like that 600ms then it comes back fine around 100ms and then suddenly 1200ms .... it's really annayoing when u play lux in ranked actually i can't even aim my Q ! plss help !!

replies.body: You can still have issues reaching specific services, like the game server.  Those ping spikes look pretty huge though, so run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to give us an analysis of your specific case.  Let me know what you find!
